body_html:
Cool, the cmake test build is a good idea.
The error

execvp: /usr/local/bin/protoc: Permission denied

seems a bit bizarre. Maybe the filesystem is mounted with noexec, or SELinux is interfering?

seems a bit bizarre. Maybe the filesystem is mounted with noexec, or SELinux is interfering?
body:
Cool, the cmake test build is a good idea.
The error

```
execvp: /usr/local/bin/protoc: Permission denied
```

seems a bit bizarre. Maybe the filesystem is mounted with `noexec`, or SELinux is interfering?
